subtitle.subtitle: Hi, we're riding the bus to Music Time.
subtitle.translation: Hi, we're riding the bus to Music Time.

subtitle.subtitle: Max loves buses. Don't you, Max?
subtitle.translation: Max loves buses. Don't you, Max?

subtitle.subtitle: Higgledy-piggledy hound, it must be time for the secret sound.
subtitle.translation: Higgledy-piggledy hound, it must be time for the secret sound.

subtitle.subtitle: [whispers] I love this part of music time.
subtitle.translation: [whispers] I love this part of music time.

subtitle.subtitle: It's a guessing game where we try to guess a secret sound.
subtitle.translation: It's a guessing game where we try to guess a secret sound.

subtitle.subtitle: The only thing I like more than guessing sounds
subtitle.translation: The only thing I like more than guessing sounds

subtitle.subtitle: Oh, you always bring the best secret sounds.
subtitle.translation: Oh, you always bring the best secret sounds.

subtitle.subtitle: What have you got for us today?
subtitle.translation: What have you got for us today?

subtitle.subtitle: [laughs] The right answer might be in there somewhere.
subtitle.translation: [laughs] The right answer might be in there somewhere.

subtitle.subtitle: A hippo? What sound do they make?
subtitle.translation: A hippo? What sound do they make?

subtitle.subtitle: [chuckles] None of those sound the same to me.
subtitle.translation: [chuckles] None of those sound the same to me.

subtitle.subtitle: Does anyone else have any idea what it is?
subtitle.translation: Does anyone else have any idea what it is?

subtitle.subtitle: Oh, we know that song. Don't we, Max?
subtitle.translation: Oh, we know that song. Don't we, Max?

subtitle.subtitle: Oh, oh, I like the part that goes…
subtitle.translation: Oh, oh, I like the part that goes…

subtitle.subtitle: ♪ Up and down, up and down ♪
subtitle.translation: ♪ Up and down, up and down ♪

subtitle.subtitle: The part that goes "swish, swish, swish," really shows off my dance moves.
subtitle.translation: The part that goes "swish, swish, swish," really shows off my dance moves.

subtitle.subtitle: This bus needs to make a pit stop
subtitle.translation: This bus needs to make a pit stop

subtitle.subtitle: or we'll never make it onto the rainbow stage.
subtitle.translation: or we'll never make it onto the rainbow stage.

subtitle.subtitle: I think it's time I taught you all how to rest.
subtitle.translation: I think it's time I taught you all how to rest.

subtitle.subtitle: I already know how to do that.
subtitle.translation: I already know how to do that.

subtitle.subtitle: [chuckling] Oh, that is one kind of rest, Ahan.
subtitle.translation: [chuckling] Oh, that is one kind of rest, Ahan.

subtitle.subtitle: And I… I do enjoy a good nap.
subtitle.translation: And I… I do enjoy a good nap.

subtitle.subtitle: But in music, a rest means stop,
subtitle.translation: But in music, a rest means stop,

subtitle.subtitle: until it's your turn to go again.
subtitle.translation: until it's your turn to go again.

subtitle.subtitle: And I know a game we can play to show you just what I mean.
subtitle.translation: And I know a game we can play to show you just what I mean.

subtitle.subtitle: I love it when Timberly does that.
subtitle.translation: I love it when Timberly does that.

subtitle.subtitle: For this game, Twinkle will be our musical traffic light.
subtitle.translation: For this game, Twinkle will be our musical traffic light.

subtitle.subtitle: we all get to go and sing.
subtitle.translation: we all get to go and sing.

subtitle.subtitle: we get to stop and rest.

subtitle.translation: Good resting. Now, keep watching Twinkle and…

subtitle.translation: ♪ The wheels on the bus Go round and round ♪

subtitle.subtitle: [chuckles] Maybe we held that rest a little too long.
subtitle.translation: [chuckles] Maybe we held that rest a little too long.

subtitle.subtitle: But I think they got the point.
subtitle.translation: But I think they got the point.

subtitle.subtitle: A rest means stop, until it's your time to go.
subtitle.translation: A rest means stop, until it's your time to go.

subtitle.subtitle: Not really. My name is Ahan,
subtitle.translation: Not really. My name is Ahan,

subtitle.subtitle: Ahan, doesn't that song have a quieter part?
subtitle.translation: Ahan, doesn't that song have a quieter part?

subtitle.subtitle: Yes, Papa, but my favorite is the loud part.
subtitle.translation: Yes, Papa, but my favorite is the loud part.

subtitle.subtitle: Today we're going to learn about--
subtitle.translation: Today we're going to learn about--

subtitle.subtitle: These mushroom stools make a loud sound when you sit on them.
subtitle.translation: These mushroom stools make a loud sound when you sit on them.

subtitle.subtitle: [laughing] I know, Maple. Loud and so funny.
subtitle.translation: [laughing] I know, Maple. Loud and so funny.

subtitle.subtitle: Who doesn't love a good, loud, floofy sound?
subtitle.translation: Who doesn't love a good, loud, floofy sound?

subtitle.subtitle: But there are some times we shouldn't be loud.
subtitle.translation: But there are some times we shouldn't be loud.

subtitle.subtitle: Like when you need to listen for something important.
subtitle.translation: Like when you need to listen for something important.

subtitle.subtitle: It's time for the secret sound.
subtitle.translation: It's time for the secret sound.

subtitle.subtitle: Here comes Tootson. He's always nice and loud.
subtitle.translation: Here comes Tootson. He's always nice and loud.

subtitle.subtitle: What sound have you got for us today?
subtitle.translation: What sound have you got for us today?

subtitle.subtitle: -I don't know it. It's strange. -[Mia] What is that?
subtitle.translation: -I don't know it. It's strange. -[Mia] What is that?

subtitle.subtitle: Max says that's the sound our dad makes when he blows his nose.
subtitle.translation: Max says that's the sound our dad makes when he blows his nose.

subtitle.subtitle: That's a very good guess, Max,
subtitle.translation: That's a very good guess, Max,

subtitle.subtitle: but I don't think that's what Tootson had in mind.
subtitle.translation: but I don't think that's what Tootson had in mind.

subtitle.subtitle: Twinkle, could you show us some guesses?
subtitle.translation: Twinkle, could you show us some guesses?

subtitle.subtitle: -A bee? -A bee buzzing around a flower.
subtitle.translation: -A bee? -A bee buzzing around a flower.

subtitle.subtitle: But I have one more hint.
subtitle.translation: But I have one more hint.

subtitle.subtitle: It's a musical instrument that anyone can play.
subtitle.translation: It's a musical instrument that anyone can play.

subtitle.subtitle: Do you know what it is?
subtitle.translation: Do you know what it is?

subtitle.subtitle: Ooh, let's find out if you're right.
subtitle.translation: Ooh, let's find out if you're right.

subtitle.subtitle: Are you sure that's an instrument?
subtitle.translation: Are you sure that's an instrument?

subtitle.subtitle: And today we all get to play them.
subtitle.translation: And today we all get to play them.

subtitle.subtitle: You just hum into it really loudly.
subtitle.translation: You just hum into it really loudly.

subtitle.subtitle: Now, to play the whole song,
subtitle.translation: Now, to play the whole song,

subtitle.subtitle: it takes just a bit more effort and some practice.
subtitle.translation: it takes just a bit more effort and some practice.

subtitle.subtitle: Almost any instrument can be played loudly or softly.
subtitle.translation: Almost any instrument can be played loudly or softly.

subtitle.subtitle: if it only came out one way?
subtitle.translation: if it only came out one way?

subtitle.subtitle: How does loud music make you feel?
subtitle.translation: How does loud music make you feel?

subtitle.subtitle: Excited like I'm the leader of my own parade.
subtitle.translation: Excited like I'm the leader of my own parade.

subtitle.subtitle: That's a great way to show how loud music can make you feel.
subtitle.translation: That's a great way to show how loud music can make you feel.

subtitle.subtitle: Soft music can help us feel cozy
subtitle.translation: Soft music can help us feel cozy

subtitle.subtitle: Look, I think Max is sleepy.
subtitle.translation: Look, I think Max is sleepy.

subtitle.subtitle: Do you need a nap, Max?
subtitle.translation: Do you need a nap, Max?

subtitle.subtitle: When it's nap time at home, our mum sings to us very softly.
subtitle.translation: When it's nap time at home, our mum sings to us very softly.

subtitle.subtitle: Maybe we should sing softly now.
subtitle.translation: Maybe we should sing softly now.

subtitle.subtitle: I don't know any soft songs.
subtitle.translation: I don't know any soft songs.

subtitle.subtitle: You can sing any song softly.
subtitle.translation: You can sing any song softly.

subtitle.subtitle: [softly] I'm pretending to be a kitten.
subtitle.translation: [softly] I'm pretending to be a kitten.

subtitle.subtitle: [laughing] Come on, little kitten. Off we go.
subtitle.translation: [laughing] Come on, little kitten. Off we go.

subtitle.subtitle: I'm still pretending. Do you want to be a kitten with me?
subtitle.translation: I'm still pretending. Do you want to be a kitten with me?

subtitle.subtitle: -I want to be a kitten. -Me too.
subtitle.translation: -I want to be a kitten. -Me too.

subtitle.subtitle: It must be time for today's secret sound.
subtitle.translation: It must be time for today's secret sound.

subtitle.subtitle: Can kittens play the secret sound game?
subtitle.translation: Can kittens play the secret sound game?

subtitle.subtitle: I think I know what it is.
subtitle.translation: I think I know what it is.

subtitle.subtitle: -Timberly, can we see our choices, please? -Absolutely.
subtitle.translation: -Timberly, can we see our choices, please? -Absolutely.

subtitle.subtitle: Hmm. Do you think it might be a cow?
subtitle.translation: Hmm. Do you think it might be a cow?

subtitle.subtitle: And it can't be a dog
subtitle.translation: And it can't be a dog

subtitle.subtitle: So that leaves us with one last picture.
subtitle.translation: So that leaves us with one last picture.

subtitle.translation: Does anyone know what it is?

subtitle.subtitle: Meow. It's a kitten like me.
subtitle.translation: Meow. It's a kitten like me.

subtitle.subtitle: And I've got just the song for us today.

subtitle.subtitle: I know what a kitten is,
subtitle.translation: I know what a kitten is,

subtitle.translation: ♪ Four little kittens In fluffy little mittens ♪

subtitle.subtitle: [children] ♪ Oh, Mummy dear We love our mittens ♪
subtitle.translation: [children] ♪ Oh, Mummy dear We love our mittens ♪

subtitle.subtitle: It's too hot to dance and wear mittens.
subtitle.translation: It's too hot to dance and wear mittens.

subtitle.translation: I'll put them down here while we practice.

subtitle.subtitle: The kitten choir sounds so wonderful.
subtitle.translation: The kitten choir sounds so wonderful.

subtitle.subtitle: Oh, I can't wait to sing on the rainbow stage later
subtitle.translation: Oh, I can't wait to sing on the rainbow stage later

subtitle.subtitle: and show off our kitten mittens.

subtitle.translation: Hey, what happened to your mittens, Maple?

subtitle.subtitle: Don't worry, Maple. We'll help you find your mittens.
subtitle.translation: Don't worry, Maple. We'll help you find your mittens.

subtitle.subtitle: Working together is what choirs do.
subtitle.translation: Working together is what choirs do.

subtitle.subtitle: It's what best friends do, too.
subtitle.translation: It's what best friends do, too.

subtitle.subtitle: Help us find Maple's kitten mittens.
subtitle.translation: Help us find Maple's kitten mittens.

subtitle.translation: Can you see my mittens anywhere?

subtitle.translation: I must have sat on them by mistake.

subtitle.subtitle: Thanks for helping me find my mittens, everybody.
subtitle.translation: Thanks for helping me find my mittens, everybody.
